column1: Funeral services will be on Saturday
column2: June 13th at 10:00 AM at The Church at Quail Creek. The Rev. Dale Moreland will officiate. Burial will be at 4:00 PM on Saturday at Silent Home Cemetery in Roll
column3: OK. Arrangements are by Schooler Funeral Home
column4: 4100 South Georgia. The family will receive guests at the funeral home today (Friday) from 5 PM until 6PM
